DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study Td519 demonstrate Adacel® vaccine ( Tetanus Toxoid , Reduced Diphtheria Toxoid Acellular Pertussis Adsorbed ) safe immunogenic person 10 year age . Primary Objectives : - To compare pertussis antibody response induce Adacel® person 10 < 11 year age induce Adacel person 11 < 12 year age . - To compare booster response pertussis antigen induce Adacel person 10 < 11 year age induce Adacel person 11 < 12 year age . - To compare booster response tetanus diphtheria induce Adacel person 10 < 11 year age induce Adacel person 11 < 12 year age . Secondary Objective : - To compare seroprotection rate tetanus diphtheria induce Adacel person 10 < 11 year age induce Adacel person 11 < 12 year age .
DOC.brief_title: Study Adacel® Vaccine Administered Persons 10 Years Age
DOC.detailed_description: Study participant receive single dose study vaccine monitor safety day vaccination 30 day post-vaccination .
